title: Glyphs Like These
content:
{Cross-posted with General Discussion section.)

What are some fonts with glyphs of this style?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621012733im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cfj_6274.gif)

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
Condor is more square but may be in the ballpark.

There's something called Seaside at MyFonts that is that style.

Nice suggestions - thanks.  
Carisma is probably the closest.

hhp

[Cosmos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621012733/http:/www.identifont.com/show?IE) immediately springs to mind. There's also that [Latin character set included in some Asian language fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621012733/http:/typophile.com/node/101748) by Murasu Systems, though some glyphs have ball terminals.

Cosmos and Accent Graphic are super close!

hhp

To me, Carisma seems closer then Cosmos, based on the crossbar on the f and the way the terminal taper. Cosmos seems too pinched to my eye.

- Mike Yanega
